summary: This module tests the resource pool (rpool) functionality of the Sendmail library, validating memory allocation, attachment callbacks, and proper memory cleanup. It includes debug features to report on heap state before and after resource pool operations.

logs.reason: Callback notification when an attachment is being freed from the resource pool. This helps track resource cleanup during testing.
logs.resolution: This is an informational message used for debugging. No resolution required as it's part of the test infrastructure.

logs.reason: Initializes the test framework for the resource pool functionality. This marks the beginning of the test sequence.
logs.resolution: This is an informational message for test initialization. No resolution required.

logs.reason: Enables heap checking during testing to detect memory leaks or corruption in the resource pool implementation.
logs.resolution: This is a debug setting, not an error. It's used to ensure proper memory management during testing.

logs.resolution: This is test data, not an error message. No resolution required.
